thread.section_title: banggood 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 banggood 的点评意见 | www.banggood.com
thread.title: calldonn

author: calldonn
title: calldonn
text: I live in Canada and have bought numerous items from Banggood, mostly related to smartphones, tablets, and laptops. It seems odd to be ordering from a company that is so far away (China) but I have always found them easy to deal with. Whenever I have questions about specific products, they send me prompt replies and on the rare occasion that an item has gotten lost in the mail, they have always sent me another without any hassle."Bang"means "good" in Chinese, an they live up to their name in both languages.
